text: The 1773 English cricket season was the second in which matches have been awarded retrospective first-class cricket status. The scorecards of eight first-class matches have survived. ==Matches== Eight first-class match scorecards survive from 1773.Association of Cricket Statisticians and Historians (ACS) (1981) A Guide to Important Cricket Matches Played in the British Isles 1709 – 1863. Nottingham: ACS.Results, English Domestic Season 1773, CricInfo. Retrieved 2019-02-13. *21–22 June - Surrey XI v Kent XI - Laleham BurwaySurrey v Kent, Scorecard, CricInfo. Retrieved 2019-02-14. *28–29 June - England v Hampshire XI - Sevenoaks VineEngland v Hampshire, Scorecard, CricInfo. Retrieved 2019-02-14. *2–3 July - England v Hampshire - Artillery GroundEngland v Hampshire, Scorecard, CricInfo. Retrieved 2019-02-14. *19–21 July - Kent v Surrey - Bourne PaddockKent v Surrey, Scorecard, CricInfo. Retrieved 2019-02-14. *4–5 August - Hampshire v England - Broadhalfpenny DownHampshire v England, Scorecard, CricInfo. Retrieved 2019-02-14. *16–18 August - Kent v Surrey - Sevenoaks VineKent v Surrey, Scorecard, CricInfo. Retrieved 2019-02-14. *16–18 September - Surrey v Hampshire - Laleham BurwaySurrey v Hampshire, Scorecard, CricInfo. Retrieved 2019-02-14. *27–28 September - Hampshire v Surrey - Broadhalfpenny DownHampshire v Surrey, Scorecard, CricInfo. Retrieved 2019-02-14. A number of other matches were played during the season, including matches between county teams. Full scorecards do not survive of these matches.Other matches in England 1773, CricketArchive. Retrieved 2019-02-10. The scorecard of the England v Hampshire match on 23 June is the first from which some bowling and fielding details are known, although no credit was given to the bowler when a batsman was out other than by being bowled. The card includes the first known instance of hit wicket as a mode of dismissal. ==Debutants== The following players made their first known appearance during the 1773 season. ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * Category:1773 in English cricket Category:English cricket seasons from 1764 to 1786
title: 1773 English cricket season
